short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Black Search is the best new tab page for dark mode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This personal new tab is a great choice if you're using dark mode in browser.
Black Search supports both dark and light themes. The weather widget is displayed in the upper left corner on the new tab.
Extension provides an easy to use search option, shows date and time, day of the week, quick links to your most visited sites.
Weather widget will show you current temperature, humidity, pressure and wind.

Please read carefully:
By installing the Black Search extension you agree to install this application, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy.

EULA: https://blacksearch.org/eula.html
Privacy Policy: https://blacksearch.org/privacy.html
About us: https://blacksearch.org/about.html

This extension takes over your new tab search engine and will changes it to Bing or Google, depending on your location. 

You may uninstall any time. To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

- Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
- Select "Settings" > "Extensions"
- From the list of installed Extensions, find "Black Search"
- Click on the "Remove" button to the right of "Details".


Permissions needed:
1) "Replace the page you see when opening a new tab" - to replace the default new tab with Black Search.
2) "Read a list of your most frequently visited websites" - to show you links on this sites.
3) "Detect your physical location" - to show you your relevant local weather information.
